title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the UI where the label is displayed.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the height of the label does not change.

Expected behavior: After modifying the font size, the label's height should adjust accordingly to display the entire content.
OB: When modifying the font size of the label on the UI, the height of the label does not change immediately.
EB: After modifying the font size of the label, the label's height should adjust accordingly to fully display the content.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the UI where the label is displayed.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the height of the label does not change.
